description:
Make happy hiking memories in these ultra-comfortable trail shoes. With a precise, foot-hugging fit and seamless upper, the Outrise offers sneaker-like comfort for all-day excursions. A wicking liner cover made from coffee grounds moves sweat away from your foot. Welded overlays and a toecap resist scrapes, while a gusseted tongue keeps dirt and sand out.

  • Seamless synthetic uppers have welded overlays for durability
  • Reverse camber helps maintain a natural stride
  • Rubber toecap protects the shoe and you
  • Sensifit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit
  • S.Café® recycled sockliner cover is made from coffee grounds and prevents odour and moisture build up
  • Removable OrthoLite® EVA footbeds make 15km feel like 5km
  • fuzeFOAM midsoles combine cushioning and support
  • Non-marking Contagrip® rubber outsoles provide great durability and traction
name: Salomon Outrise Light Trail Shoes - Women's
